overview:
Carbon Calculated provide an open platform of carbon data and leading carbon and energy management solutions.

Carbon Calculated’s offerings help businesses, public and third sector, sustainability consultants and software developers to calculate, report and reduce carbon and greenhouse gas emissions while complying with legislation.

Products:

Carbon Calculated provide both off-the-shelf and bespoke carbon and energy management solutions provided thorough SaaS delivery.

ECM - is an enterprise carbon management solution that enables organisations to accurately calculate and report emissions to internationally recognised standards. The system has been designed to fully comply with GHG protocol reporting, ISO 14064, Carbon Disclosure Project, and measures and collates all information necessary in the CRC Energy Efficiency Scheme and EU-ETS.

ConstructionCC - enables organisations to calculate the greenhouse gas emissions of construction, civils, and refurbishment projects. The system measures the carbon footprint of a project across four key areas â€“ Materials, Waste, Energy Consumption and Commuting.

Platform and Developer API:

The Carbon Calculated platform is a free and open system containing emissions data for all types of green house gasses on a huge variety of items, from microwaves and steel rods, to air travel. Sources and instructions are provided for each set of objects and standards, allowing developers to easily access verified emissions data through the Carbon Calculated browser. The API has been designed to be as developer friendly as possible and allows software engineers to quickly build accurate carbon calculation tools without spending vast amounts of time understanding the complexities of carbon standards and data.

A set of free “miniapps” have also been provided that allow anyone to calculate emissions using the Carbon Calculated Platform.
